Changes.LogName: Jas, Vincent, Adrian, and Tina play in town - 2 hearts

Entries.79402191/f Jas 500/f Adrian 500/t 1200 1: CloudCountry/20 14/farmer 30 12 0 Adrian 19 17 0 Jas 17 16 1 Tina 20 16 3 Vincent 19 15 2 Haley 24 23 2/skippable/pause 1700/speak Vincent "I'm telling you, he's a vampire...$0"/pause 600/speak Tina "Well, Vincent, that doesn't make any sense.$1"/pause 600/speak Vincent "Why not? Have you ever seen him in this part of town? No, because he's hiding in that weird guy's tower. I'm telling you, he's a vampire.$0"/pause 500/speak Adrian "Are vampires even real?$2"/pause 700/speak Tina "Come on Adrian, think logically: If he were a vampire he wouldn't be able to go out on sunny days, but Jas saw him outside, didn't you, Jas?$0"/pause 600/speak Jas "...Can we not talk about this?$2"/pause 700/speak Vincent "Uh, well, maybe he's a different kind of vampire. Or maybe a werewolf boy...$0"/pause 700/speak Jas "Can't we just play games?$2"/pause 700/speak Vincent "What, are you scared now? (laughs) Come on, Jas.$1"/pause 1500/pause 600/speak Jas "I'm not scared or anything, I just don't want to talk about the old man's son in the woods. I thought we were here to play...$2"/pause 500/speak Tina "Jas is right. Let's play jump rope!$1"/pause 350/move Jas -3 0 3/pause 350/move Tina -3 0 1/pause 1200/end

Entries.79402192/f Tina 500/z winter/j 10/t 1300: CloudCountry/5 5/Tina 2 5 2 Robin 1000 2000 0 farmer 1500 200 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Robin "Tina, can I come in?$0"/pause 80/speak Tina "Yeah, Mom, you can come in.$0"/pause 850/playSound doorOpen/pause 150/warp Robin 3 4/pause 500/speak Robin "What are you doing, sweetie?$0"/pause 350/move Robin 0 1 3/pause 350/move Tina 0 0 1/pause 350speak Tina "I'm making a birthday card for Seb.$0"/pause 500/speak Robin "...$0"/pause 500/speak Robin "This looks wonderful, Tina!$1"/pause 500/speak Robin "I'm sure your brother will love it.$1"/pause 500/speak Tina "Are you really sure?...$2#$b#I mean, what if he doesn't like it?...$2"/pause 600/speak Robin "What do you mean, honey? I'm sure Sebby will love this card you made for him.$0#$b#It looks really great, I love the snowgoon you drew.$2"/pause 500/speak Tina "But Sebastian seems very unhappy lately. I don't know if this is enough to make him happy...$2"/pause 500/emote Robin 12/pause 600/speak Robin "Aw Honey, it's true that Seb's been feeling a bit down lately, but he loves you very much. I'm sure he'd love to get a card from you. I think it will take more than a nice card to help Seb, but I know that it will show him how much you care, and that's always helpful.$2"/pause 500/speak Tina "I hope this will make him happy again.$1#$b#If he likes it, I will make dozens or even hundreds of birthday cards for him.$1"/pause 500/speak Robin "Haha I'm sure he'll like it, but instead of so many cards you could help me with the birthday cake. I'm making a special pumpkin cake! $1"/pause 700/speak Tina "Okay, Mom.$1#$b#I'll be right there...$3"/pause 500/speak Robin "Don't forget to wash your hands, sweetie!$0"/pause 1200/end

Changes.LogName: Vanessa and Uncle Gus at the saloon - 2 hearts

Entries.79402193/f Vanessa 500/t 1200 2200: CloudCountry/11 18/Vanessa 14 18 2 farmer 14 24 0 Gus 12 17 0 Pam 7 8 1/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 500/speak Vanessa "Hello, welcome.$1"/pause 500/speak Vanessa "Today I'm helping my uncle at the Saloon!$1#$b#Isn't that great?$0"/pause 600/move Gus 0 1 2/speak Gus "Welcome, @.$0"/pause 600/speak Gus "Emily's off today, so my little niece Vanessa is helping me out in the kitchen.$1"/pause 600/speak Vanessa "We cooked a lot of food.$0"/pause 600/speak Gus "What can we get you? The spaghetti's excellent today, if you'd like my recommendation.$1"/pause 600/end

Entries.79402194/f Douglas 1500/w rainy/t 1100 1: Cloth/31 16/Krobus 31 17 2 farmer 1500 200 0 Douglas 31 20 0/skippable/pause 350/speak Douglas "How are you today, Krobus!$1#$b#I brought you a gift.$0"/pause 350/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 16 11/faceDirection farmer 0/move farmer 0 10 1/pause 200/pause 600/speak Douglas "Who in the world is this?$0"/pause 380/move Douglas -6 0 3/move Krobus 0 5 3/move Douglas 0 1 3/pause 600/speak Douglas "Hey, I think it's the farmer$4"/pause 500/speak Douglas "$q -1 null#What are you doing here, Farmer @?#$r -1 0 event_douglas1#I'm here to visit a friend!#$r -1 0 event_douglas2#I'm here to do some shopping."/pause 700/speak Krobus "Welcome back, @...$1"/pause 1200/end

Entries.79402195/f Douglas 2000/f Wizard 1000/t: playful/8 18/farmer 1500 200 0 Douglas 10 17 2 Wizard 8 16 1/skippable/pause 1800/speak Wizard "You got everything, son?...$0"/pause 600/speak Douglas "Yeah, everything's in my bag.$0"/pause 600/speak Wizard "Okay, remember, try to stay still while teleporting or you might fall hard to the ground....$1"/pause 500/warp farmer 8 23/faceDirection farmer 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 200/speak Douglas "Hey, hello Mr. @^Hey, hello, Ms. @...$1"/pause 500/speak Wizard "Greetings, @. Douglas is just on his way to visit his mother. I'm saying goodbye to him...$3"/pause 600/speak Douglas "See you in a few days, Farmer @.$1#$b#I'm ready to go now. See you, Dad..$1"/pause 500/speak Wizard "See you later, son.$2"/pause 500/playSound wand/pause 100/warp Douglas 200 100/pause 700/speak Wizard "Yes, you may be surprised to learn that Douglas' mother is still alive.$0"/pause 700/speak Wizard "She was not a good wife. Er, rather, *we* were not a good couple together. But now she and I are good co-parents. Much better since the separation.$0#$b#Douglas is really different, he... He makes me a better person.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "Anyway, I have important things to do now, @. So long.$1"/pause 1200/end
